Item.name: Colors
Item.help:
Press X or Z to rotate your token.
To clear off a square, line up the same 4 colors vertically or horizontally.
You need to clear off all the square pieces to...
I don't know, save the universe or something?

Item.name: Row Row Row
Item.help:
If you fill in a complete horizontal row, that whole row will disappear.
Sometimes that's easier. Sometimes it's harder. You figure it out.
Item.pattern: fill_rows(1, black+blue*0, blue) + fill_rows(1, black+orange*1, orange) + fill_rows(1, black+white*2, white) + shuffle(fill_rows(3, green*4))

Item.name: Easy
Item.help:
I don't mean to criticize, but you need some practice.
Okay, you might say this level is just filler.
But I think you deserve a level that isn't a tutorial or a gimmick.

Item.name: Seeing Red
Item.help:
You think you're pretty good. Don't you?
Well, let's see how you do with the crappy colors.
Item.pattern: (red + black) * COLUMNS / 2 + (black + red) * COLUMNS / 2 + (red + black) * COLUMNS / 2 + (black + red) * COLUMNS / 2

Item.name: Wild Thang
Item.help:
Some tokens know from a young age what color they will grow up to be.
But other tokens never know. They go to college, change majors eight times, and get a worthless degree.
These tokens will gladly accept any job you give them.

Item.name: All Thumbs
Item.help:
I don't remember promising that all your tokens would have two pieces.
Tokens are raised in the river, downstream from factory farms.
Sometimes they get mutated.

Item.name: Hip 2 B
Item.help:
Why didn't you see all these different token shapes earlier?
Well, we have a strainer filtering them out of the stream.
Where did we put the crap? In this level, mostly.

Item.name: Shapes
Item.help:
Tokens, like humans, come in all shapes and sizes.
Every token has its place.
You should love them all.

Item.name: Still Seeing Red
Item.help:
Don't call these tokens freaks. They can make things less...
tedious.
Item.pattern: (red + black) * COLUMNS / 2 + (black + red) * COLUMNS / 2 + (red + black) * COLUMNS / 2 + (black + red) * COLUMNS / 2

Item.name: Bunker Buster
Item.help:
Okay, Mister Smarty Pants.
Let's see how well you do if I don't even give you the colors you need.
I'll even drop bombs on you just to destroy your hard work.
Item.pattern: shuffle(fill_rows(4, 8 * red + 8 * yellow)) + fill_rows(1, black + white + white + white + black + white + white + white + black + white + white + white) + fill_rows(1, black + white + yellow + white + black + white + yellow + white + black + white + yellow + white) + fill_rows(1, black + white + yellow + white + black + white + yellow + white + black + white + yellow + white)

Item.name: Bustin' Two
Item.help:
You were too good with bomb.
So I have called upon demons to rain down on you destroying all in their path.

Item.name: Novelty
Item.colors: 0.15 red 0.15 white 0.15 green 0.15 yellow 0.20 bomb 0.20 wild
